mods.abstract: Image of a group of monks during a debate at the Séra Monastery. One of two monks in the foreground is smiling, and the other is holding a picture of the 14th Dalai Lama (who, at the time, is in exile in India). Monks in the background are sitting in circles or standing, talking to one another or looking at the camera.
mods.note: ""Young monks debating at Lhasas Sera Monestary." The monk in the foreground is holding a picture of the Dali Lama - Tibets spiritual leader who in now in exile in India.," "Vol 18 #2," "Sept 5/89." is written on the back of the photograph.
